articles.title: ‘Mohammad Rizwan was unable to breathe; had to inject ‘prohibited’ medicine' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rizwan, who ended as the third-highest run-scorer of the T20 showpiece event with 281 runs in six games, developed a severe chest infection after which he was admitted to the hospital.
